shows.title: The Bondsman
shows.overview: Murdered bounty hunter Hub Halloran is resurrected by the Devil to trap and send back demons that have escaped from the prison of Hell. By chasing down those demons with the help and hinderance of his estranged family, Hub learns how his own sins got his soul condemned -- which pushes him to seek a second chance at life, love, and country music.

shows.title: Paradise
shows.overview: Tranquility explodes when a shocking murder occurs and a high-stakes investigation unfolds.

shows.title: Newtopia
shows.overview: Jae-yoon, a late military enlistee, and his girlfriend, Young-joo, break up over the phone over growing misunderstandings. But a zombie outbreak rocks the world. A national emergency is declared, a plane crashes in the city center, and Jae-yoon and his unit get trapped on top of a Seoul skyscraper. Young-joo risks the zombie-filled streets to find him. Can their love survive the apocalypse?

shows.title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man
shows.overview: Peter Parker is on his way to becoming a hero, but his path to get there is anything but ordinary.

shows.title: American Primeval
shows.overview: A mother and son fleeing from their past form a found family while confronting a harsh landscape of freedom and cruelty in the American West.

shows.title: SAS Rogue Heroes
shows.overview: Frustrated with military command and their handling of the war in North Africa, David Stirling and Jock Lewes formulate a plan to parachute men into the desert to attack enemy forces from behind the front line.

shows.title: Raw
shows.overview: WWE's groundbreaking in-ring series highlights over three decades of unforgettable matches, moments and Superstar-studded episodes.

shows.title: Star Wars: Skeleton Crew
shows.overview: "Skeleton Crew" tells the story of four kids searching for their home planet after getting lost in the Star Wars galaxy, and the strange aliens and dangerous places they encounter on their adventure.

shows.title: Agatha All Along
shows.overview: The infamous Agatha Harkness finds herself powerless after a suspicious goth Teen breaks her free from a distorted spell. Her interest is piqued when he begs her to take him on the legendary Witches’ Road, a magical gauntlet of trials that, if survived, rewards witches with what they need. Together, Agatha and the Teen pull together a desperate coven, and set off down, down, down The Road...

shows.title: The Day of the Jackal
shows.overview: An unrivaled and highly elusive lone assassin, the Jackal, carries out hits for the highest fee. He meets his match in a tenacious British intelligence officer who starts to hunt down the Jackal in a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase across Europe.

shows.title: Black Doves
shows.overview: When a spy posing as a politician's wife learns her lover has been murdered, an old assassin friend joins her on a quest for truth — and vengeance.

shows.title: Secret Level
shows.overview: SECRET LEVEL is a new adult animated anthology series featuring original stories set within the worlds of some of the world’s most beloved video games. From the creative minds behind LOVE, DEATH + ROBOTS, each of the 15 episodes is a celebration of games and gamers.

shows.title: Totally Spies!
shows.overview: A fresh, fast-paced and fun show about three Beverly Hills girlfriends who balance life at high school with the unpredictable pressures of international espionage!

shows.title: Creature Commandos
shows.overview: From DC and James Gunn, Creature Commandos is an edgy animated series that tracks a secret team of incarcerated monsters recruited for missions deemed too dangerous for humans. Facing a violent invasion in Pokolistan, Amanda Waller (Viola Davis) must dispatch a team to aid their ally -- but is no longer able to use humans on such dangerous missions. Undeterred, Waller names General Rick Flag Sr. (Frank Grillo) the leader of a new squad made up of Belle Reve’s most dangerous and undesirable monster inmates. Alongside The Bride, Dr. Phosphorus, Weasel, GI Robot and Nina Mazursky (voiced by Indira Varma, Sean Gunn, Alan Tudyk and Zoe Chao, respectively), Flag must keep Princess Ilana Rostovic safe ... even from his own unpredictable and highly volatile team.

shows.title: Dune: Prophecy
shows.overview: From acclaimed author Frank Herbert's expansive Dune universe, the highly anticipated prequel series Dune: Prophecy follows two Harkonnen sisters as they combat forces that threaten the future of humankind – and establish the fabled sect that will become known as the Bene Gesserit. Ten thousand years before the ascension of Paul Atreides, Valya and Tula Harkonnen (Emily Watson and Olivia Williams) are devoted to the Sisterhood, whose influence spans the Imperium through its network of Truthsayers. But while Valya believes the key to protecting the Sisterhood is advancing their power all the way to the Imperial Throne, others within the order fear her ambitions are dangerous. Inspired by the novel "Sisterhood of Dune" by Brian Herbert and Kevin J. Anderson, Dune: Prophecy is a fascinating origin story that explores the moral complexity of political, religious, and social power.

shows.title: Dragon Ball DAIMA
shows.overview: When Goku and others become small due to a conspiracy, they explore the unknown Demon Realm with Glorio.

shows.title: Dan Da Dan
shows.overview: When Momo and Okarun's beliefs clash, they're thrown into a world of ghosts, aliens, and awakened powers.

shows.title: Cross
shows.overview: Based on NY Times Bestselling author James Patterson’s #1 hero, Cross is a crime thriller that follows the investigations of brilliant forensic psychologist and DC Metro Detective Alex Cross. Together with his best friend and partner Detective John Sampson, Cross delves into the psyches of America’s most insidious killers while fighting to protect his family from the dangers of the criminal world

shows.title: The Last of Us
shows.overview: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

shows.title: Solo Leveling
shows.overview: They say whatever doesn’t kill you makes you stronger, but that’s not the case for the world’s weakest hunter Sung Jinwoo. After being brutally slaughtered by monsters in a high-ranking dungeon, Jinwoo came back with the System, a program only he could see, that’s leveling him up in every way. Now, he’s inspired to discover the secrets behind his powers and the dungeon that spawned them.
shows.originalTitle: 俺だけレベルアップな件
